item.title: About Me
item.description: Experience Jun 2017 - Apr 2019 Junior Software Engineer at Linio Mexico. Oct 2015 - Nov 2016 Windows Azure Consultant & Software Developer. Aug 2015 - Oct 2015 Intern Consultant & Software Developer. Skills Languages & Tools: JavaScript, PHP, ReactJS, Symfony Git Operating Systems Linux, MacOS, Windows Education Web Desing and Programming: CDI College Point Claire MTL 2019 - 2020 Lic Project Management Engineer: Universidad Panamericana Specialty. 2015 - 2016 Lic Information technologies and smart systems: Universidad Panamericana 2009 - 2015 Facts: I use a Cochlear implant.
